Text: Not fail...I got it to work perfectly.  You just need to export the .srt file from the zip and load it into your media player along with the movie.  I use VLC media player.

Ah, I was just about to give up--An hour had passed, and another hour, and nothing.... and then all of a sudden, boink! Subtitles arrived! 

NOTE: these are apparently for the 2:18 length version of this movie, but there are also 2:12 and 2:26 versions floating around. Kind of annoying.
